longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and/or passport replacing documents must be valid
  on arrival. 

Visa required, except for Nationals of Poland. 
Minors:
- WARNING! In accordance with European Union (EU) Legislation,
  all minors who are nationals of Poland will be expected to
  hold their own passport or National ID Card (where
  applicable) when departing from Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus,
  Romania or a Schengen Member State . 
Additional Information:
- Visitors are required to hold proof of sufficient funds to
  cover their stay, evidence of pre-booked accommodation and
  documents required for their next destination.
Warning:
- Visitors not holding return/onward tickets could be refused
  entry.



 Falkland Isl
vaccination:
Vaccinations not required. 

Warning:
- It is essential that all visitors obtain good medical
  insurance which also provides for aeromedical evacuation.
- Persons ordinarily resident in the United Kingdom and
  eligible for treatment on the UK National Health Service are
  entitled to treatment in the Falkland Isl. (Malvinas) under
  a reciprocal healthcare agreement, however, this does not
  include aeromedical evacuation.
